constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 65 (Thursday, April 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. WATERS:
H.R. 2547.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 cl. 3, To regulate Commerce with
Foreign Nations, Among the Several States, and with the
Indian Tribes
[Page H1843]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

title: Comprehensive Debt Collection Improvement Act
